ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, drained

cookingTips: Brown ground beef thoroughly, breaking it up as it cooks for consistent texture
Add onions early to soften them while beef is cooking
Stir in cheese off heat or on low heat to prevent curdling
enrichment.coachingPrompt: A simple, stovetop nacho dip that's ready in one pan. Will you serve this warm with chips, or use it as a topping for something else?
